meanings.sent1: The unrelieved pain in his leg made it hard for him to walk.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed medication to help with the unrelieved discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The unrelieved ache in his tooth made him regret not going to the dentist sooner.
meanings.sent4: The unrelieved sorrow in her heart weighed heavily on her spirit.
meanings.sent5: The unrelieved tension in the room was palpable, making everyone uneasy.

meanings.sent1: The unrelieved blue sky stretched endlessly above us.
meanings.sent2: The unrelieved noise of the construction site made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent3: The unrelieved pattern of the wallpaper made the room feel monotonous.
meanings.sent4: The unrelieved routine of his daily life left him feeling bored and uninspired.
meanings.sent5: The unrelieved silence in the library was broken only by the turning of pages.

meanings.sent1: The unrelieved heat of the desert made it difficult to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The unrelieved workload left him feeling overwhelmed and exhausted.
meanings.sent3: The unrelieved traffic jam caused frustration among the drivers.
meanings.sent4: The unrelieved anxiety gnawed at her mind, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The unrelieved hunger in his stomach made him regret skipping breakfast.
